column4: hey gnome takes forever to load i tryed installing alsa and that didn't work but with esd disabled gnome loaded like it was nothing, any ideas?
errrr i had that problem yesterday
i finally got it fixed though can you apt-get install nvidia-glx ?
did you read that link.. it explains everything I have done (yes I have btw)
to be honest i dont now exactly how i fixed it but i can help one sec lemme ready that
yes that went off with out hitch
now this mod is loaded Ill try restarting X
I hope I dont have to modprobe every time..
you can add it to a file one sec

it was already there. I rebooted to make sure it would work fine, I guess I should have known this part would have been the same as gentoo but I figured that when I did the reinstalls of the driver it would modprobe for me.. lesson learned, and thanks for the help
